head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CLANCY, MARGARET CATHERINE (PEGGY)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CLANCY, MARGARET CATHERINE (PEGGY)

block.p: CLANCY--Margaret Catherine (Peggy), on June 6th, 2007, of New York, NY. Dear wife of the late Asher B. Lans, loving daughter of Margaret Mary and the late William E. Clancy. Dear sister of William E. Jr., John J., Elizabeth R. and Ambrose T. Clancy. Most loving aunt of Angela, Regina and Shauna, Elizabeth, John and Maryann, and Dierdre. Greataunt of nine nieces and nephews. Reposing at Fox Funeral Home, Ascan Ave., corner Metropolitan Ave., Forrest Hills, NY. Sunday June 10th, 2-5 and 7-9. Funeral Mass Our Lady Queen of Martyrs R.C. Church, Queens Blvd. at Ascan Ave., Forrest Hills, NY, Monday June 11th, at 9:30am. Interment St. John's Cemetery.
